title: 5 Lessons from ESCAPE/19: The Multi-Cloud Conference
description:
Following his keynote on the big stage at ESCAPE/19Armon Dadger, CTO and Co-Founder of HashiCorp, sat down with John Furrier of The Cubeand said, “If you had this exact same conference 3 or 4 years ago everyone would’ve been like, what Multi-Cloud? Multi-Cloud is not real. And now nobody questions the premise. They’re like, ‘obviously we’re going to be multi-cloud.’”
The inevitability of multi-cloud permeated the speaking sessions at ESCAPE/19 - the inaugural Multi-Cloud Conference hosted in downtown NYC.

title: A Story of a React Re-Rendering Bug
Structuring a Real-World Serverless App
description: In this post we'll be looking at how to structure a real-world Serverless Framework application.
